heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny, except partly cloudy near the international border, and in the Adirondacks. Highs in the low to mid 20s north, mid to upper 20s in the south. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 15 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clear to partly cloudy. Lows from zero to 10 below, cold spots around 15 below. Winds becoming light and variable.
